title: Antiques Provencaux, two Typefaces from Southern France
content:
Hi,

wondering if I could find these typefaces:

I: roi feneant, the red-title-typeface  
II: antiques provencaux

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [photo.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724023939/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_47.JPG) | 65.5 KB |

author: ac54

comments.content:
II might have some relationship to the work of Louis Perrin (The Lyons Capitals). Some interesting info in an old thread: [http://typophile.com/node/7596](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724023939/http:/typophile.com/node/7596 "http://typophile.com/node/7596")  
Don
